entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 09:13 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: WNW 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blizzard developing near noon. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre early this morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming east 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then clearing. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southeast 30 this evening. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
